Standard form elements

Standard form elements

Guidelines on form element styles.

On this page
  • Text fields
  • Select option fields
  • Form buttons
  • Text box / button combinations
  • Contextual help
  • Examples and assets

Text fields

Text box

View state:

Descriptive error message

CSS styles

Label
label {
    color: #333333;
    font-family: OpenSans;
    font-size: 16px;
    letter-spacing: 0.2px;
    line-height: 28px;
}
Input
input {
    height: 52px;
    padding: 10px;
    border: solid 1px #495C74;
}
input:focus {
    outline: none;
    border: solid 3px #254F90;
}
input.error {
    border: solid 3px #D2201E;
}
input.disabled {
    border: solid 1px #E2E2E2;
    background-color: #F5F5F5;
}
Error message
p.error-message {
    color: #D2201E;
    font-family: OpenSans;
    font-size: 16px;
    letter-spacing: 0.2px;
    line-height: 28px;
}

    background-color: #F5F5F5;
}

    text-align: right;
}

Radio buttons

View state:

Descriptive error message

CSS styles

Label
.radio-group-label {
    color: #333333;
    font-family: OpenSans;
    font-size: 16px;
    letter-spacing: 0.2px;
    line-height: 28px;
}
.input-group-wrapper {
    height: 52px;
    padding: 10px;
    border: solid 1px #495C74;
}
.input-group-wrapper:focus {
    outline: none;
    border: solid 3px #254F90;
}
.input-group-wrapper.error {
    border: solid 3px #D2201E;
}
.input-group-wrapper.disabled {
    border: solid 1px #E2E2E2;
    background-color: #F5F5F5;
}
.radio-button {
    border: solid 2px #AAB2C3;
    height: 24px;
    width: 24px;
}
.radio-button-label {
    color: #333333;
    font-family: OpenSans;
    font-size: 16px;
    letter-spacing: 0.2px;
    line-height: 28px;
}
.radio-button-label:focus {
    color: #254F90;
    font-family: OpenSans-Semibold;
}
.radio-button-label.error {
    color: #333333;
    font-family: OpenSans;
}
.radio-button-label.disabled {
    color: #8E8E8E;
    font-family: OpenSans;
}
p.error-message {
    color: #D2201E;
    font-family: OpenSans;
    font-size: 16px;
    letter-spacing: 0.2px;
    line-height: 28px;
}

Form buttons

Primary action button

View state:

Submit

CSS styles

Button container
.primary-button {
border: 2px solid #254F90;
border-radius: 6px;
padding: 8px 32px;
text-align: center;
background: #4569A0;
box-shadow:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 2px 4px 0px;
transition-property: transform, -webkit-transform;
transition-duration: 0.4s, 0.4s;
transition-timing-function: ease, ease;
transition-delay: 0s, 0s; 
}
.primary-button:hover {
border: 2px solid #18335C;
background: #254F90;
box-shadow:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3) 0px 4px 8px 0px;
transform: translateY(-.1875rem);
}
.primary-button:active {
border: 2px solid #18335C;
background: #18335C;
box-shadow:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3) 0px 4px 8px 0px;
transform: translateY(-.1875rem);
}
.primary-button.disabled {
border: 2px solid #C7C7C7;
text-align: center;
background: #FFFFFF;
box-shadow:none;
}
Button text
a {
color: #FFFFFF;
font-family: OpenSans-Semibold;
font-size: 16px
line-height: 28px;
}
a.disabled {
color: #8E8E8E;
}

Secondary action button

View state:

Previous

CSS styles

Button container
.secondary-button {
background: #FFFFFF;
border: 2px solid #4569A0;
box-shadow:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 2px 4px 0px;
border-radius: 6px;
padding: 8px 32px;
text-align: center;
letter-spacing: 0;
transition-property: transform, -webkit-transform;
transition-duration: 0.4s, 0.4s;
transition-timing-function: ease, ease;
transition-delay: 0s, 0s;  
}
.secondary-button:hover {
background: #254F90;
border: 2px solid #18335C;
transform: translateY(-.1875rem);
box-shadow:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3) 0px 4px 8px 0px;
}
.secondary-button:active {
background: #18335C;
border: 2px solid #18335C;
}
.secondary-button.disabled {
border: 2px solid #C7C7C7;
text-align: center;
background: #FFFFFF;
box-shadow:none;
}
Button text
a {
color: #4569A0;
font-family: OpenSans-Semibold;
font-size: 16px
line-height: 28px;
}
a:hover {
color: #FFFFFF;
}
a:active {
color: #FFFFFF;
}
a.disabled {
color: #8E8E8E;
}

Button group

View state:

Cancel
Save

CSS styles

Primary button container
.primary-button {
border: 2px solid #254F90;
border-radius: 6px;
padding: 8px 32px;
text-align: center;
background: #4569A0;
box-shadow:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 2px 4px 0px;
transition-property: transform, -webkit-transform;
transition-duration: 0.4s, 0.4s;
transition-timing-function: ease, ease;
transition-delay: 0s, 0s; 
}
.primary-button:hover {
border: 2px solid #18335C;
background: #254F90;
box-shadow:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3) 0px 4px 8px 0px;
transform: translateY(-.1875rem);
}
.primary-button:active {
border: 2px solid #18335C;
background: #18335C;
box-shadow:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3) 0px 4px 8px 0px;
transform: translateY(-.1875rem);
}

border: 2px solid #C7C7C7;
text-align: center;
background: #FFFFFF;
box-shadow:none;
}

font-size: 16px

}
a.disabled {
color: #8E8E8E;
}
Tertiary link
a {

font-family: OpenSans-Semibold;
text-decoration: underline;
font-size: 16px
line-height: 28px;
}
a:hover {
color: #254F90;
}
a:active {
color: #18335C;
}
a.disabled {
color: #8E8E8E;
}

}

}

Text box / button combinations

Text box combined with primary button

View state:

Add

Descriptive error message

CSS styles

Label
label {
    color: #333333;
    font-family: OpenSans;
    font-size: 16px;
    letter-spacing: 0.2px;
    line-height: 28px;
}
Text field
input {
    height: 52px;
    padding: 10px;
    border: solid 1px #495C74;
}
input:focus {
    outline: none;
    border: solid 3px #254F90;
}
input.error {
    border: solid 3px #D2201E;
}
input.disabled {
    border: solid 1px #E2E2E2;
    background-color: #F5F5F5;
}
Primary button container
.primary-button {
    border: solid 1px #495C74;
    border-radius: 6px;
    border-top-left-radius: 0px;
    border-bottom-left-radius: 0px
    padding: 10px 24px;
    text-align: center;
    background: #4569A0;
}
.primary-button:focus {
    background: #254F90;
    solid 3px #254F90;
}
.primary-button:active {
    background: #18335C;
    solid 3px #254F90;
}
.primary-button.error {
    border: solid 3px #D2201E;
    background: #4569A0;
}
.primary-button.disabled {
    border: 2px solid #C7C7C7;
    text-align: center;
    background: #FFFFFF;
    box-shadow:none;
}
Primary button text
a {
    color: #FFFFFF;
    font-family: OpenSans-Semibold;
    font-size: 16px
    line-height: 28px;
}
a.disabled {
    color: #8E8E8E;
}
Icon
.icon {
    color: #FFFFFF;
    height: 14px;
    width: 14px;
}
Error message
p.error-message {
    color: #D2201E;
    font-family: OpenSans;
    font-size: 16px;
    letter-spacing: 0.2px;
    line-height: 28px;
}

Contextual help

Inline help - simple

View state:

Help message providing information on how to fill out the field.

Descriptive error message

CSS styles

Help text

p.help-text {
    color: #666666;
    font-family: OpenSans;
    font-size: 14px;
    line-height: 24px;
    padding-bottom: 16px;
}

Inline help - complex

View state:

How to work out your input credits

First work out the lesser of the following two amounts, then divide that amount by three.

Expenditure in acquiring or producing credit inputs and energy inputs for which you have claimed the incentive, to the extent that it is reasonably attributable to the production of the relevant output (expenditure).

Descriptive error message

CSS styles

Help text link

.help-link {
    color: #4569A0;
    font-family: OpenSans;
    font-size: 14px;
    line-height: 24px;
    text-decoration: underline;
}

Arrow icon

.icon {
    color: #4569A0;
    height: 12px;
    width: 8px;
}

Help details

.help-details {
    color: #333333;
    font-family: OpenSans;
    font-size: 14px;
    line-height: 24px;
    border-left: solid 2px #254F90;
    padding-left: 8px;
}

Error summary

The following issue(s) must be corrected before you can continue.

  • Critical error that needs to be fixed
  • Another thing that needs to be fixed before you can continue

Note: An error summary can be used when a form that contains errors is submitted. The error summary should never replace error states and messaging on each form field.

CSS styles

Paragraph
p {
    color: #D2201E;
    font-family: OpenSans;
    font-size: 16px;
    line-height: 28px;
}
Warning icon
.icon-warning {
    color: #254F90;
    background: #FFFFFF;
    width: 40px;
    height: 40px;
}
Container
div {
    background-color: #FCE9E9;
    border-top: 4px solid #F5B5B5;
    padding: 16px;
    border-radius: 0;
}
